title: One of my Discussions Was deleted on Boards
body:
... and I received no explanation as to why.

This is not the first time this has happened to me, and I think it's rather unfair.

Did I post it in the wrong category, or something?
Why couldn't it just be moved?

I know there was nothing offensive about it, so Why would it _need_ to be deleted?

Most of all, If this did happen... you know EVER... _**I would expect to get some kind of notice.**_ something on my boards profile, and email, SOMETHING.
Instead, it's just gone. not searchable. not listed among "my discussions" on my profile.
just gone.

Can someone tell me the policy on this? Because it seems to be a problem.

replies.body:
Hey there, moderation should be followed by a reason why.  You should see an exclamation mark icon on the top right of the boards to review your notification regarding that.  

It looks like you had a post that was in the wrong section of the boards.  Reviewing it, you may want to repost it on the [gameplay ](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/gameplay-balance)boards.  It was previously posted in an area specifically for feedback on the boards itself.    I hope that helps clear things up!

Thankyou!

It looks like the notification you mention _was_ in fact sent to me, but it seems to have been marked as read, without my actually having read, or even seen the alert first.

I can manually check these, now, where as i didn't know where to look before.
Thanks for the help.
